pkgmetadata.longdescription: Penalized Elastic Net S/MM-Estimator of Regression // Robust penalized elastic net S and MM estimator for linear regression. The method is described in detail in Cohen Freue, G. V., Kepplinger, D., Salibian-Barrera, M., and Smucler, E. (2017) https://gcohenfr.github.io/pdfs/PENSE_manuscript.pdf.
